name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust backend systems utilizing **Golang**, **Kotlin**, and **PHP**, and adeptly managing **Microservices** architecture. Proficient in cloud services, particularly **AWS**, and equipped with strong capabilities in **GitLab CI/CD** for effective deployment and automation. Demonstrated excellence in **Databases** management and integration, problem-solving, and fostering collaboration across teams. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines, contributing to significant projects at prestigious companies including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

- Developed **microservices** architecture to improve scalability and maintainability, enabling system integration across diverse platforms.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitLab CI/CD** for automated testing and deployment, achieving a deployment frequency of **3** times per week.

• Leveraged **Microservices** architecture to manage backend deployments, ensuring seamless integration with various **databases** across multiple environments.

• Conducted thorough security audits and integrated robust authentication methods using **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, enhancing security and compliance for over **500+** user accounts.
